about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello! My name is Nestor Cicardini, and I'm a passionate full-stack programmer from Argentina.
about.paragraph2: Despite being a novice developer, I've already tackled personal projects, gaining hands-on experience and building a strong foundation in various programming languages, frameworks, and technologies.
about.paragraph3: What sets me apart is my insatiable curiosity and commitment to staying updated with industry trends, always ready to embrace new challenges and expand my skill set.
about.paragraph4: Thank you for visiting my portfolio! Feel free to explore my projects and get in touch if you'd like to collaborate or discuss any exciting opportunities.

projects.title: Projects
projects.project1Description: Weather application with a clean and minimalistic interface.
projects.project3Description: Calculates your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on your weight, height, age, and gender.
projects.project4Description: A simple and handy app for creating and managing tasks.
projects.project5Description: Find your favorite games or discover new ones.
